page.title: 13Medical cover,Holbeach Hurn.
page.content: There are no medical facilities at all in Holbeach Hurn or the surrounding area.There are 2 group practices of G.P.s in Holbeach and most people go there in the first instance.If hospital treatment is needed there is a small hospital in Holbeach where clinics are held,but if further treatment is required patients must travel to Pilgrim Hospital at Boston or Johnson Hospital,Spalding.There are also hospitals at Wisbech,(Cambs. authority),Kings Lynn(Norfolk) and Peterborough(Cambs.)Dental treatment can be obtained at the clinic in Holbeach,or at a dentists in Holbeach or out of the area.There is a mother and baby clinic in Holbeach on Thursdays and ante-natal classes for mothers-to-be on Wednesdays.Most local babies are born in Pilgrim Hospital or Johnson maternity unit.
